column20:
R1Prohibited between St Budeaux
Victoria Road Station and Buffer
Stops (Beyond Bere Alston)

R1Prohibited from working in multiple.
In the event of failure it shall be
repaired in situ. If unable to repair
assistance shall only be provided by
a Class 150 under the supervision of
the Railway Undertaking
